Package io.atlasmap.service

Class MappingService

java.lang.Object
io.atlasmap.service.BaseAtlasService
io.atlasmap.service.MappingService
@Path("/project/{mappingDefinitionId}/mapping") public class MappingService extends BaseAtlasService
Provides backend REST services for handling mappings.

    • removeFieldMappingRequest

      @DELETE @Path("/{mappingId}/field/{dataSourceType}/{fieldIndex}") @Produces("application/json") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response removeFieldMappingRequest(@PathParam("mappingDefinitionId") Integer mappingDefinitionId, @PathParam("mappingId") String mappingId, @PathParam("dataSourceType") DataSourceType dataSourceType, @PathParam("fieldIndex") Integer fieldIndex)
      Remove the specified field from the specified mapping in the mapping definition.
      Parameters:
      mappingDefinitionId - - mapping definition identifier (session)
      mappingId - - mapping identifier within the specified session
      dataSourceType - - source/ target
      fieldIndex - - field index to be removed
      Returns:
      empty response
